reviewText: Two masters of the steel string guitar, together and solo. A unique opportunity to see the late Jack Rose. If you're a fan of the late John Fahey and "American Primitive Guitar" this is not to be passed up.
This album is no nonsense. Listen to interview and you will find new artists that will blow your mind.

Glenn Jones and the late, great Jack Rose.  If you find yourself reading this and you're not already familiar with these two incredible guitarists/composers, go straight to youtube.

This DVD contains so much excellent performance footage of these two, which alone is worth whatever you've got to do to get your hands on this.  The extended interview with Jones and Rose, however, is the real reason to pick this up.
